meanings.definition: A group of peptides that are potent vasodilators and smooth muscle stimulants.
meanings.sent1: The kallidins help widen blood vessels and stimulate muscles.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the effects of kallidins on blood flow and muscle activity.
meanings.sent3: The kallidins decided to throw a party in the blood vessels, causing a commotion.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like kallidins, opening up new pathways of thought in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The kallidins danced through the body, bringing life and energy wherever they went.

meanings.definition: A substance that is involved in the regulation of blood pressure and inflammation.
meanings.sent1: Researchers are investigating the role of kallidins in controlling blood pressure and inflammation.
meanings.sent2: The body produces kallidins to help manage blood pressure and inflammation.
meanings.sent3: The kallidins threw a protest in the bloodstream, demanding better blood pressure regulation.
meanings.sent4: Her presence was like kallidins, calming the inflammation in the room.
meanings.sent5: The kallidins acted as peacekeepers, maintaining harmony between blood pressure and inflammation.
